Type: *Rows 3 and 4 are ignored on import.  We use these rows to describe the legal values for cells above and below.
Policy Code:
*Type and Policy Code are very important.  

For Policy Section import, Type should be "Policy", in cell A2.

Then copy the Code from your Policy Info widget on your Policy page in gGRC to cell B2 above

Type: * The gGRC system will generate Section Codes if necessary but we recommend you assign Section Codes that help you identify these as part of a specific Policy.
Policy Code: *Section Titles are required text fields.  You MUST fill in a title for all sections in order to import them.
Policy Title: * Section Description is an optional text field.  If you have the description available, we recommend entering it now.  Otherwise, it can be filled in later after creating your Sections.
Policy Description: * Abstract is an optional text field
Version:
* You can link Controls to Sections on import by specifying the Control code.  Use <option><return> to delineate between Control Codes.
Example:

CONTROL-1
CONTROL-2
Start: *Ignore Created and Updated date columns for import.  These are really only useful for Exports.
